pr_title: CB-5752 OpDB 7.1.0 cluster definitions out of sync for AWS and Azure

timeline.message: CB-5752 OpDB 7.1.0 cluster definitions out of sync for AWS and Azure
CB-5752 OpDB 7.1.0 cluster definitions out of sync for AWS and Azure
CB-5752 OpDB 7.1.0 cluster definitions out of sync for AWS and Azure

timeline.bodyText: Should be extended to set the 7.1.0 - Operational Database: Apache HBase blueprint to DEFAULT_DELETED along with CDP 1.2 - Operational Database: Apache HBase, Phoenix
timeline.author: keyki
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,11 @@
+-- // CB-5752 OpDB 7.1.0 cluster definitions out of sync for AWS and Azure
+-- Migration SQL that makes the change goes here.
+
+UPDATE clustertemplate SET name = '7.1.0 - Operational Database with SQL for AWS' WHERE status = 'DEFAULT' AND name = '7.1.0 - Operational Database with Phoenix for AWS';

replies.bodyText: I have added the update statement for that now.
replies.author: stoty
